name: Past Tense
prompts: My dog ( jump ) over the fence in February
I ( feed ) everyone dinner yesterday
She ( dive ) off the diving board at the pool last night
He ( drink ) soda at the restaurant last weekend
Yesterday we ( run ) a mile in gym
They ( drive ) me to work last weekend

name: Fill in the Blank
prompts: ( to go ) My family is __________ to the beach tomorrow
( to teach ) Our professor __________ us physics last week
( to cook ) What my mom __________ for dinner always tastes good
( to study ) Last night, we ____________ at the library
( to buy ) I __________ groceries at last Tuesday
( to watch ) Did you ________ the new movie?

name: Fix the Sentence
prompts: I drived home last night
They seen the movie already
She sleeped over with her friends
He are coming early to the party
They wants to talk to the professor
We runned in the marathon last weekend

name: Write a Sentence Using the Following
prompts: To go, the store (present tense)
She, moving to California
To ask, a question (past tense)
To run, the race (present tense)
To sell, lemonade (past tense)
We, going to college
